summary: A hip hop horror anthology of three tales of terror told by the Hound of Hell that revolve around the residents of an inner-city neighborhood whose actions determine where they will go in the afterlife.

keywords: vietnam war veteran|satire|bad taste humour|tied to a chair|suffocation
title: Hood of Horror
